name: Hooghly Jute Soumak Rug - Ecru/Charcoal
description: A muted colour palette prevents this hardwearing jute rug from feeling overbearing. Adorned with geometric shapes, including diamonds and criss-crosses, it's ideal for a modern scheme. Place in a hallway, bedroom or wherever you like. Soumak Rugs (also known as tapestry weaves), like the Hooghly, are purposefully pile-less. They are woven incredibly tightly, which gives them a coarse feel and allows any subtle decoration to take centre stage. Highly textured, this technique is what gives the Hooghly its unique, beautifully rustic appearance.
